mapper.insert: insert into c_trade( id, owner, amount, name, expectedTradeDate, stage, type, source, createBy, createTime, description, contactMinute, nextContactTime, customerId, activityId, contactId )values ( #{id}, #{owner}, #{amount}, #{name}, #{expectedTradeDate}, #{stage}, #{type}, #{source}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{description}, #{contactMinute}, #{nextContactTime}, #{customerId}, #{activityId}, #{contactId} )
mapper.select:
select
t.id, u.name as owner, t.name, t.stage, t.type, t.source, ctr.name as customerId, ctt.name as contactId
from c_trade t join c_user u on t.owner = u.id left join c_customer ctr on t.customerId = ctr.id left join c_contact ctt on t.contactId = ctt.id
and t.name like concat('%', #{name}, '%')
and u.name like concat('%', #{owner}, '%')
and ctr.name like concat('%', #{customerName}, '%')
and t.stage like concat('%', #{stage}, '%')
and t.type like concat('%', #{type}, '%')
and t.source like concat('%', #{source}, '%')
and ctt.name like concat('%', #{contactName}, '%')
order by t.createTime desc
limit #{skipCount}, #{pageSize}

select count(*)
from c_trade t join c_user u on t.owner = u.id left join c_customer ctr on t.customerId = ctr.id left join c_contact ctt on t.contactId = ctt.id
and t.name like concat('%', #{name}, '%')
and u.name like concat('%', #{owner}, '%')
and ctr.name like concat('%', #{customerName}, '%')
and t.stage like concat('%', #{stage}, '%')
and t.type like concat('%', #{type}, '%')
and t.source like concat('%', #{source}, '%')
and ctt.name like concat('%', #{contactName}, '%')

select
t.id, u.name as owner, t.amount, t.name, t.expectedTradeDate, t.stage, dv.orderNo as stageNo, t.type, t.source, t.createBy, t.createTime, t.editBy, t.editTime, t.description, t.contactMinute, t.nextContactTime, ctr.name as customerId, a.name as activityId, ctt.name as contactId
from c_trade t join c_user u on t.owner = u.id left join c_customer ctr on t.customerId = ctr.id left join c_contact ctt on t.contactId = ctt.id left join c_activity a on t.activityId = a.id left join c_dic_value dv on t.stage = dv.value
where t.id = #{id}

select
id, name, amount, stage, expectedTradeDate, type
from c_trade
where customerId = #{customerId}

select
id, name, amount, stage, expectedTradeDate, type
from c_trade
where contactId = #{contactId}

select stage as name, count(*) as `value`
from c_trade group by stage
